description: Non Material Amendment to Condition 2 (Plans) of Planning Permission 19/01076/FUL (Erection of single storey building for use as a management suite and reception. Internal and external alterations to existing buildings to facilitate refurbishment of existing student accommodation, including installation of PV panels, with associated parking and landscaping arrangements.). Please see cover letter for changes.
decision_conditions: Officers would need to carry out a detailed assessment of the impact of the proposed amendments on the character and design of the approved development, the impact that this could have on the character and appearance of the Conservation Area as well as the quality and mix of cycle parking provision.  Taking account of all of the above, the proposed amendments are considered not to be non-material as they would require a full assessment in terms of compliance with Policies CS6, CS7, CS8, DM8, DM9, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy (2012).

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.
